entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm north of Cape Ray. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
